TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IReceiveMessageCallback

Docs.summary: Implements a callback to be executed when a service message is received by the and activities.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example shows how to implement the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.IReceiveMessageCallback> interface to access a message header when a message is received.
[!code-csharp[AccessingOperationContext#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/accessingoperationcontext/cs/receiveinstanceidcallback.cs#1)]
